summary: This is an email chain from January 25, 2021, arranging the handoff of a hard drive containing confidential responsive items from an image review. A paralegal specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY coordinates with an FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office to meet outside 'BA' (likely a building or location) to transfer the drive.

persons.name: Mandy
persons.context: The FBI Special Agent from the New York Field Office is coordinating a meeting to receive a hard drive containing confidential responsive items from a paralegal specialist.

persons.name: Paralegal Specialist
persons.context: A paralegal specialist from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY has prepared a hard drive copy containing confidential responsive items from an image review and is arranging its handoff to an FBI Special Agent.

connections.description: Coordinating the transfer of evidence (a hard drive with confidential responsive items) from the U.S. Attorney's Office to the FBI.

events.title: Hard Drive Handoff Arranged
events.description: A meeting is arranged for 2:30 PM to hand off a hard drive containing confidential responsive items from an image review from a paralegal specialist to an FBI Special Agent.

locations: BA (likely a building or location, mentioned as meeting point outside)
keyFacts: A hard drive containing confidential responsive items from an image review was prepared for handoff from the U.S. Attorney's Office SDNY to the FBI.
The handoff was scheduled for 2:30 PM on January 25, 2021, outside a location referred to as 'BA'.
The communication highlights ongoing investigative coordination between the U.S. Attorney's Office and the FBI regarding evidence in the case.
